task.title: Cloning Workflow Reports
task.shortdesc: Cloning workflow reports allows you to create a similar object without starting from scratch.

step.cmd: Click on the workflow report that you would like to clone (in your or a project dashboard).
Click on Clone in the workflow report form, beside the workflow report your would like to clone.
step.info: This will take you to a Clone Workflow Report, which you can modify if you wish.

taskbody.result: Your cloned workflow report will appear in the list of workflows. You now can begin to work with your cloned workflow report.
